meanings.definition: A material used in construction to improve the properties of concrete.
meanings.sent1: Contractors mixed pozzolans into the concrete to make it stronger.
meanings.sent2: The engineer recommended using pozzolans to enhance the durability of the building.
meanings.sent3: The pozzolans in the concrete seemed to give it a magical touch, making it unbreakable.
meanings.sent4: The pozzolans acted like tiny superheroes, strengthening the concrete with their powers.
meanings.sent5: Adding pozzolans to the mix was like adding a secret ingredient that made the concrete indestructible.

meanings.definition: Pozzolans are commonly used as a substitute for cement in certain applications.
meanings.sent1: The construction team decided to use pozzolans instead of cement for the project.
meanings.sent2: In some cases, pozzolans can be a cost-effective alternative to traditional cement.
meanings.sent3: The pozzolans played a game of hide-and-seek with the cement, proving to be the better choice.
meanings.sent4: The pozzolans stepped up to take the place of cement, showing their versatility.
meanings.sent5: Switching to pozzolans was like discovering a new, more efficient way to build structures.
